portfolio.title: NetFrnds
portfolio.description: A full-stack social media platform built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, allowing users to post updates, like, comment, share. Implemented secure JWT-based authentication and optimized state management using Redux. Introduced dark/light mode for improved UX and ensured 99% data security. Real-time interactions and a responsive UI built with Material UI enhanced user engagement and accessibility.

portfolio.title: Real Estate Website
portfolio.description: Developed a full-stack Real Estate platform enabling users to list, search, and manage properties for sale or rent. Integrated Prisma ORM with MongoDB for efficient data handling and implemented secure JWT-based authentication. Used Express.js for backend APIs and WebSocket for real-time chat, resulting in a 25% boost in engagement and a 20% improvement in backend performance.

portfolio.title: Film List
portfolio.description:
Developed a Movie Watch-List Application using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS which allows users to search for movies, view movie details, and add movies to a personal watchlist. Utilized the OMDB API to retrieve movie data. MongoDB is used for managing the data, and Cookie Parser is used for managing sessions.
Tech Stacks: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Mongoose, JWT
